name: Ty D.I.Y. Edition Shower Curtain
description: Ty D.I.Y. Edition Ty is a simple #2 plastic shower curtain. Unlike other shower curtains made of vinyl, Ty will not off-gas in your home. Also unlike vinyl, Ty breathes – making it less likely to grow gross mold and mildew. Ty is stronger than vinyl and will last a very long time, then it can be recycled. Draw: Use the attached permanent marker to draw a custom design on Ty. For best results, draw on the shiny side. If necessary, protect your drawing surface from any marker bleed. Your illustration is permanent. Let it dry completely before using or washing. Download Spec Sheet Download Draw-A-Thon Designs For Inspiration Dimensions: Height: 72 in / 183 cm Width: 60 in / 152 cm Color: White with your choice of blue, green or black permanent marker. Material: 100% High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) and nickel plated metal grommets. HDPE is one of the most commonly recycled plastics and is PVC free. Care: Ty can be machine washed with a mild detergent. Washing will create a soft linen-like texture. Cold water only. Please hang dry. No iron. Recycle: At the end of Ty’s useful life, cut off the metal grommets and recycle locally. The rest of Ty can be recycled at a facility that accepts #2 plastics, or by returning it to Grain at: 1201 Wing Point Way NE, Bainbridge Island, WA 98110. Environmental / Social: Ethically Produced Non-Toxic Recyclable Supports Small USA Business 1% For The Planet Process: Manufacturing waste is minimal and recycled in the shop. Packaging is minimal and printed on 100% post consumer recycled content chipboard using locally sourced soy-based inks. Origin: Made in the Pacific Northwest, USA. Pricing: Wholesale and trade prices are available. Contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Special Orders: Custom dimensions are available. Please contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Design: Grain is committed to socially and environmentally responsible design. Find out more online at: www.graindesign.com Questions: shop@graindesign.com Learn more about the environmental/health problems associated with vinyl shower curtains here.

name: Hung
description: Hung Inspired by James’ past experience as a boatbuilder in Maine, Hung is an oval shaped waterjet cut mirror threaded and hung by manila rope. Dimensions: Mirror Height: 30 in / 76.2 cm Overall Height: 39 in / 99.1 cm Width: 16 in / 40.6 cm Depth: 0.25 in / 0.6 cm Rope Dia: 0.75 / 1.9 cm Color: Natural Material: Mirrored glass, manilla rope, bamboo label, brass connector and screws. Care: Please use mircofiber cloth to clean mirror. Environmental / Social: Ethically Produced Made From Renewable Materials Non-Toxic Supports Small USA Business 1% For The Planet Origin: Made in the Pacific Northwest, USA. Pricing: Wholesale and trade prices are available. Please contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Special Orders: Custom orders are available. Please contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Design: Grain is committed to socially and environmentally responsible design. name: Utility Card
description: Utility Card The Utility Card uses a word search puzzle to hide over 100 classic well wishes. Ready for any occasion, simply circle the sentiment you wish to communicate. Blank space for writing provided on the back. The card is letterpressed on extra thick tree-free paper that uses cotton fiber waste from textile manufacturing, and comes with a brown 100% post-consumer recycled content envelope plus cheat-sheet* to help find the right words. Sentiments: CLASSICS: Congratualtions Get Well Soon Happy... Anniversary / Birthday / Fathers Day / Hanukkah / Holidays / Kwanzaa / Mothers Day / New Year / Valentines Day Merry Christmas Thank You Sorry For Your Loss SUBJECTS SUCH AS: Baby Boy / Girl Dog Father / Dad Friend(s) Girl Home Mate Me Mother / Mom My Love(ly) Queen Us We You(r) HIT PHRASES: Smitten Be Mine Come Home Soon Feel Better Forgive Me Good Luck Hello Love Howdy Friend I Am Sorry I Love You I Miss You I Messed Up Its A Boy / Girl Mazel Tov Nice To Meet You Thinking Of You Way To Go Welcome Home Werq Queen Wish You Were Here You Are Invited You Are Lovely You Are Perfect ADD-ONS LIKE: From Please So Soon Too We wish you... XX Download Cheat Sheet (coming soon, see images) Dimensions: Height: 4 in / 10.2 cm Width: 6 in / 15.2 cm Color: White with kraft paper envelope. Materials: Card is made with tree-free paper that uses cotton fiber waste from the textile manufacturing industry. Envelope and cheat-sheet are 100% post-consumer recycled kraft paper. Inks are non-toxic. Recycle: Recyclable with papers. Environmental / Social: Ethically Produced Non-Toxic Recyclable Supports Small USA Business 1% For The Planet Origin: Printed in California, USA. Pricing: Wholesale and trade prices are available. Contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Design: Grain is committed to socially and environmentally responsible design. Find out more online at: www.graindesign.com *Note - European version of card may ship with a different answer key than pictured. To see a sample, please email us. Questions: shop@graindesign.com

name: Chi-Chi, 3 Strand
description: Chi-Chi Named after the famous Chichicastenango Market, known by many as the most colorful market in North America, Chi-Chi was originally inspired by the shape and construction of skeins of thread used for ikat tie-dying. Chi-Chi is handmade by artisans in Guatemala and available in a variety of colors, lengths, and thicknesses. This necklace has three strands made of yellow and grey threads. Dimensions: Height: 15 in / 38.1 cm Width: 8 in / 20.3 cm Depth: 3 in / 7.6 cm Color: Blue, Green, Orange, Red, or Yellow. Material: 100% cotton Environmental / Social: Ethically Produced Non-Toxic Supports Guatemalan Artisans Supports Small USA Business 1% For The Planet Origin: Made in Guatemala. Pricing: Wholesale and trade prices are available. Contact shop@graindesign.com for more information. Design: Originally designed as part of the 2006 Rhode Island School of Design course, Bridging Cultures Through Design, led by Mimi Robinson. Read more about Bridging Cultures Through Design here. Grain is committed to socially and environmentally responsible design. Find out more online at: www.graindesign.com Questions: shop@graindesign.com
